price: Allah akura umugisha mu mutungo urimo Riba, agatubura amaturo, kandi Allah ntakunda umuhakanyi, umunyabyaha.
arabic: يَمۡحَقُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلرِّبَوٰاْ وَيُرۡبِي ٱلصَّدَقَٰتِۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ أَثِيمٍ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yamḥaqu al-lahu al-riba wayur'bī al-ṣadaqāti wal-lahu lā yuḥibbu kulla kaffārin athīmin
